descriptionHtml:
[color=#9900ff][size=4][color=#9900ff]*REQUIRES DAWNGUARD DLC*[/color] [/size][/color]

[color=#38761d][size=4]Short Description[/size][/color]

A newly founded guild named the Arrow-Smiths have entered Skyrim, but do you dare to join them? With 17 new quests, Delve into the past of the guild and discover a great secret that lies in the history of the Arrow-Smiths. Wipe out enemy guilds, take part in massive battles, and even hunt vampires. With many tasks to undertake, are you prepared for the challenge? 
------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

[color=#38761d][size=4] Detailed Description[/size][/color]

The Arrow-Smiths have been around for centuries, but has only ever had two masters. The first was Master Bolten, who was slaughtered in a vampire attack that slaughtered [color=#efefef]everyone[/color] in the sanctuary except three members that outlasted the onslaught. Rebecca, Gargen and the new leader, Barcen. Ever since then, the guild has never been restored to it's former glory, and has been barely scraping by. It's obvious the Arrow-Smiths need help to earn it's respect back. That's where you come in.

An Arrow-Smith Hunter was dispatched to Riften to spread word of the guild looking for new members. If you take the offer, expect an epic adventure and journey through the past of the Arrow-Smiths. Make new friends, arch enemies and take control. Delve deep into forbidden secrets and discover a life of riches that's beyond your wildest dreams.

If you think it sounds simple, you could never be more wrong.

Good luck, Arrow-Smith.
[s] [/s]-----------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=6]If you like the mod, please endorse it!
[/size]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#274e13][color=#38761d][size=4]Features: [/size][/color][/color]
- 17 New original quests 
- A complete quest line 
- Fully voiced characters 
- 3 New followers to help you 
- New outfits 
- New weapons 
- A new sanctuary that acts as a players home 
- Major battle scenes and enemies to triumph over 
- A new guild for you to take over 
- Lore friendly 
------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
[color=#38761d][size=4]How to Start:[/size][/color] 
You can either travel to Riften and speak to a high elf Arrow-Smith archer in the market, or simply head to the sanctuary yourself and speak to the leader Barcen. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------
[youtube]TKV1tZYNun0[/youtube]
------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#38761d][size=6]UPDATE 2.0 Features
[/size][/color]Update 2.0, the Major Update is here! Randin needs your help with a venomous, vicious and brutal Bounty Hunter named Cadden Bave. Are you up to the challenge?

[color=#38761d][size=5]FEATURES:[/size][/color]
- 4 New Quests
- New Characters
- More/Improved dialogue
- Better boss battles
- Appearance changes
- Bug fixes
- Arrow-Smith Member files
- Quest related dialogue
- Adds Arrow-Smith Arrows
- Adds Arrow-Smith Greatsword
[color=#38761d][size=5]How to Start:
[/size][/color]Complete the "Battle" quest, then talk to Randin in the Sanctuary.
[color=#efefef][size=2]-----------------------------------------------------------------------[/size][/color]
[color=#38761d]Download:[/color]
Program Files (x86) > Steam > SteamApps > common > Skyrim > Data
Place the ArrowSmith.bsa, ArrowSmith.bsl, ArrowSmith.esp, ArrowSmith.ckm in the Data file.
Place the SEQ folder in the Seq file.
Data > Sound > Voice and place the ArrowSmith.esp file that's in the Sound > Voice into the Voice file.

------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
[color=#38761d][size=4]Bugs:[/size][/color]
- Jarin's lips do not move when he speaks 
- The game has a possibility to crash in the final battle
- People not understanding how to complete the final battle
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please report any bugs 
Thanks for playing!
author: TheOscar0
